overview.en: Nsure is an open insurance platform for Open Finance. The project borrows the idea of Lloyd’s London, a market place to trade insurance risks, where premiums are determined by a Dynamic Pricing Model. Capital mining will be implemented to secure capital required to back the risks at any point of time. A 3-phase crowd voting mechanism is used to ensure every claim is handled professionally.
overview.zh: Nsure是一个是一个为开放性金融准备的开放性保险平台，是去中心化的“劳合社”，为希望转移风险的人与愿意承接风险的资本提供交易平台。
